configurableConfig.description: Input numbers for the width and height.
configurableConfig.label: Height

config.text: Allow resulting image dimensions to be larger than the original

configurableConfig.description: Padding is applied with invisible pixels.
configurableConfig.label: Pad sides

script:
for image in "${@}"; do
  old_width="$(../get-image-property 'pixelWidth' "${image}")"
  old_height="$(../get-image-property 'pixelHeight' "${image}")"

  if [[ "${enlarge}" -eq 0 ]] && [[ "${width}" -gt "${old_width}" || "${height}" -gt "${old_height}" ]]; then
    echo "Input values would result in padding, and the option is turned off: ${image}" >&2
    exit 0
  fi
done

for image in "${@}"; do
  /usr/bin/sips --cropToHeightWidth "${height}" "${width}" "${image}"
done
